events.name: MacMed Formal
events.desc: Such new friends. Much Excite.

events.name: Classes Start
events.desc: The Journey Begins.

events.name: Access Card Get!
events.desc: Opens all the doctor-doors. +10 Doctor Points.

events.name: Touched first thoracic cage
events.desc: Seriously, got all up in there. +25 Doctor Points.

events.name: Jared and Megan's Wedding
events.desc: Cut the rug so hard.

events.name: Stethoscope Get!
events.desc: So stylish. So med school. +50 Doctor points.

events.name: Respirology Unit Conquered!
events.desc: Lungs - check. +30 Doctor Points.

events.name: White Coat Get!
events.desc: Basically a Doctor now. +40 Doctor Points.

events.name: Autumnal Adventure day!
events.desc: An amazing Maize maze.

events.name: First Heart Dissection
events.desc: It was a pig heart, but still. +15 Doctor Points.

events.name: Hair Cut!
events.desc: Kara Thrace-style. +5 Aerodynamic points.

events.name: Water polo goalie
events.desc: They didn't lose!

events.name: Ontario medical student weekend
events.desc: So much learning. And sweet potato fries.

events.name: Suture master
events.desc: Saved dozens of banana lives. +23 Doctor Points.

events.name: Astronaut Meet!
events.desc: Desire for flight suit rocketed *heh*. +10 Space points.

events.name: Tutorial group final dinner
events.desc: End of an era.

events.name: First DnD Session
events.desc: lvl 1 rouge FTW

events.name: First ER shift
events.desc: Detached Finger? Check. Spinal Trauma injury? Check. Flushed out wounds? Check. +64*3 Doctor Points.

events.name: Birthday!!!
events.desc: Blurp Blurp Blorp Blorp Blop.

events.name: Gift Get!!!!
events.desc: Scott gets +89,004 Boyfriend points.

events.name: Operating Room: Scrub-In
events.desc: Very, very clean forearms for my first sutures!

events.name: Update!
events.desc: Scott finally updated this to let me add events.
